thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Vivendi Earnings Rise

author: Nick Kostov
title: Vivendi Earnings Rise
text:
PARIS—Vivendi SA on Wednesday reported a rise in second-quarter net profit, boosted by a windfall from the sale of its Brazilian telecom unit GVT to Telefónica SA.
Vivendi, which in recent years has substantially slimmed down from a telecommunications to broadcasting conglomerate to a company with activities mainly in pay TV and music recording, said net profit rose to €1.96 billion, compared with €1.48 billion a year earlier.
